name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an accomplished Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing cutting-edge solutions utilizing **Python**, **Django**, **Vue.js**, **AWS**, and **Docker**. My proficiency in full-stack development includes frameworks like React and Next.js as well as back-end technologies such as Node.js and FastAPI. I have a robust cloud background with expertise in deploying applications on **AWS**. 
I have successfully led teams in the creation of enterprise-grade platforms, integrating AI/ML for predictive analytics and real-time data processing. My solid understanding of microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation enables me to deliver secure applications compliant with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Additionally, I possess hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows with tools such as MLflow and Airflow.
